actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the removal of the public debt limitations contained in section 11 of the Organic Act of Guam.

summary.text: Stipulates that the public indebtedness of Guam shall not exceed 10 percent of the aggregate tax valuation of the property in Guam, unless such excess is approved by the people of Guam by referendum.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the removal of the public debt limitations contained in section 11 of the Organic Act of Guam.
